ygData.subject: RE: Thank you Brian!  Verant does listen!
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure on mana drain (I ve heard very inefficient) but here is the max Hp drain.. Lifetap (Sk Lvl 9, Necro lvl 1) - 5Hps LifeSpike (Sk Lvl 15, Necro Lvl 4) -
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure on mana drain (I've heard very inefficient) but here is the max Hp
drain..

Lifetap (Sk Lvl 9, Necro lvl 1) - 5Hps
LifeSpike (Sk Lvl 15, Necro Lvl 4) - 11Hps
LifeDraw (Sk lvl 30, Necro Lvl 12) - 45Hps

The word I'm think of is useless.



-----Original Message-----
From: Jeremy Stovall [mailto:jeremy@...]
Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 2:19 PM
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Thank you Brian! Verant does listen!


From: Jeremy Stovall <jeremy@...>

Does anyone know the number of HP and mana cost of these taps?

-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Sent: 10/22/99 2:36 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Thank you Brian! Verant does listen!

From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

Straight from the test server login...
Thank you Brian for listening to the players. Although some may be
dismayed at the loss of Voice Graft, all in all I don't think anyone
can complain about this one. Let's hope this makes it to the live
servers.

Xilith

October 21st, 10:30am
---------------------

*ShadowKnight Enhancements*

Shadowknights may now use the following spells:

- LifeTap may now be cast at level 9.
- LifeSpike may now be cast at level 15.
- LifeDraw may now be cast at level 30.

The LifeTap, LifeSpike, and LifeDraw spell scrolls may be purchased from
any ShadowKnight spell vendor.

To make room for these new spells, the following spells are no longer
available for ShadowKnights:

- Reclaim Energy
- Mend Bones
- Voice Graft

- The EverQuest Team
